mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id, c.item_id, c.member_id, c.count, c.cart_price, i.item_barcode, i.name, i.product_origin, i.unit, i.company, i.notice, i.keep, i.item_status, i.price FROM cart c, item i WHERE c.item_id = i.item_id AND c.member_id = #{memberId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(member_id, item_id, count, cart_price, created_time) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{itemId}, #{count}, #{cartPrice}, sysdate())
